title: Mac and Cheese
directions: Melt butter in large saucepan on low heat.
Remove half of butter; mix with bread crumbs.
Stir flour into remaining butter in saucepan; cook and stir 1 min.
Gradually stir in milk until well blended; cook and stir until thickened.
Add VELVEETA and 1-1/2 cups cheddar; cook until melted, stirring frequently.
Spoon into 1-1/2-qt. casserole; top with remaining Cheddar and buttered crumbs.
Bake 20 min. or until heated through.
ingredients: 1/4 lb. (4 oz.) 2% Milk VELVEETA®, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 pkg. (7 oz.) KRAFT Shredded Fat Free Cheddar Cheese, divided
